4-Server Panel Buttons
 Server related actions are here: settings, multipliers, cache.
4-1Reload and others.
Reload: Tries to reload the specified instance manager. Possible values are: multisell,skill,npc,htm,item,instancemanager,npcwalkers.
Reload HTM: Flushes HTM cache.
Reload File: Flush cache for specified HTM file.
Skill Test: Much like //effect, receives an skill ID as parameter, affects target, or caster.
Reload CW: Reloads Cursed Weapon manager.
Reload Zone: Reloads zone manager.
Reload Crest: Rebuilds crest cache.
Crest Fix: Converts old crest files if found.
Reload Tele: Reload teleport destinations.
Social: Make characters play social animations. Quickbox can contain socialid, (opt.) player name and (opt.) radius. If only one parameter is supplied, affects target.
Open/Close All: Open or close all every door in the server.
Zone check: Performs zone checks on demand.
4-2 Geodata.
(those who know what they do, also know which one is valid)
4-3 Development.
FightCalc: Initiate dialos for fight calculation between two mobs. Packet Forge: Starts packet crafting facilities.
System message: Sends the specified system message to you.
4-4 Maintenance.
Stats: Display server stats about memory usage, tasks, etc.
Login: Display information and options related to the login server.
Shutdown: Display restart/shutdown server related actions.
